product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nulana Knickers - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Nulana Knickers are flattering, durable and stretchy. You'll love the nylon/spandex fabric for yoga, running, climbing and more. Super-durable, warp-knit fabric wicks moisture away from the skin, dries fast and stretches easily with your every move. Low-profile waistband feels good under a pack or even under shorts or a skirt. Mountain Hardwear Nulana Knickers feature a reverse-entry pocket inside the back waistband. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Nulana Knickers are flattering, durable and stretchy. You'll love the nylon/spandex fabric for yoga, running, climbing and more.
